title: If you're the top 0.1% in Korea, you still have 2000 people to beat
body: On OCE, you have 2000 people to beat as the top 1%. I find that crazy. We have it so much easier here

replies.body:
According to OP.GG I'm top 29.27% which means by your figures 58 540 more people to beat.
But(!) OP.GG also places me as rank 52 987 :/.

> According to OP.GG I'm top 29.27% which means by your figures 58 540 more people to beat.
> But(!) OP.GG also places me as rank 52 987 :/.

That's because you're bronze and irrelevant.

Even if I was bronze the OP's numbers are still off, which was one of the points of my post.
In OCE 1% of ranked players is significantly less (11.5%) than what the OP prescribed.
What do you expect when you see numbers that are rounded to the nearest thousand?
For them to not be rounded to serverly! :P
We have a smaller player base m8
yep, having 2.8 million players as opposed to 180,000 will certainly do that
